meanings.definition: A printed cotton fabric with a glazed finish, used for curtains and upholstery.
meanings.sent1: The room was brightened by the colorful chintzes on the curtains.
meanings.sent2: She picked out some lovely chintzes for the new sofa.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat decided to play hide-and-seek among the chintzes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed off the walls covered in chintzes.
meanings.sent5: The chintzes whispered stories of faraway lands to anyone who would listen.

meanings.definition: To cover or decorate with chintzes.
meanings.sent1: She carefully chintzes the chairs to match the tablecloth.
meanings.sent2: He chintzes the walls with beautiful floral patterns.
meanings.sent3: The children playfully chintzes the tree with colorful ribbons.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness chintzes the room with warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The artist chintzes the canvas with vibrant strokes of paint.
